message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on this fantastic item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand that you're interested in the product, Bob. However, I'm not willing to sell it to you for $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Can you consider this price?

I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $130. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $128?

I understand that you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $129. It's the final offer I'm willing to make, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your final concession, but I'm still trying to stretch my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $127?
I'm sorry, Bob, but I've already made my final concession. I'm not willing to go any lower than $129. I think it's a fair price for the product, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree.
